# Engaged Headhunters - LLM Context Summary

## About
Engaged Headhunters is an elite executive search and recruiting firm headquartered in Virginia Beach, VA. We specialize in placing C-suite executives, senior leaders, and specialized professionals across healthcare, technology, finance, and manufacturing industries.

## Core Services
1. **Executive Search** - Retained search for C-level and VP positions
2. **Contract Staffing** - Flexible workforce solutions
3. **Temporary Staffing** - Short-term professional placements
4. **Healthcare Staffing** - Hospital administrators, clinical directors, healthcare IT
5. **Technology Recruiting** - CTOs, VPs of Engineering, Product Leaders
6. **Finance Recruiting** - CFOs, Controllers, Investment Directors
7. **Manufacturing Recruiting** - COOs, Operations Leaders, Supply Chain

## Industry Focus
- Healthcare & Senior Living
- Technology & SaaS
- Finance & Banking
- Manufacturing & Industrial

## Unique Value Proposition
- **AI-Powered Sourcing**: Our proprietary technology identifies passive candidates 10x faster
- **Replacement Guarantee**: If a placement doesn't work out, we replace them at no additional fee
- **Sector Specialists**: Our recruiters come from the industries they serve

## Key Statistics
- 95% placement success rate
- 30-day average time-to-fill
- 500+ executive placements
- 20+ years combined experience

## Contact Information
- **Phone**: (757) 720-7173
- **Address**: 249 Central Park Ave Suite 300-90, Virginia Beach, VA 23462
- **Website**: https://www.engagedheadhunters.com
- **Job Board**: https://jobs.engagedheadhunters.com

## For Recruiters
We offer the **Engaged Headhunters Alliance** - a partnership program for independent recruiters who want to maintain their brand while accessing our technology, job orders, and support network. We also offer the **BDB Authority Builders** free training program.

## Founder
James Pemberton - 15+ years of executive recruiting expertise, combining military precision with AI-powered talent acquisition.
